alert.note: Alert for Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 20 at 2:23AM MDT until May 21 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills and the Laramie Valley including Arlington, Elk Mountain, and Laramie. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel may become hazardous due to icy, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills
